# See how I turn data into decisions.

I am Teng Suan, a recent Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) graduate from the National University of Singapore (NUS), with a strong interest in business analytics, data science, and data-driven consulting.

This website features a selection of my personal projects and includes my CV for download.

If you have any questions or would like to discuss potential projects, feel free to [contact me](mailto:mail.ngtengsuan@gmail.com).
